about_the_game:
Adapted according to the real event of a programmer running away!

This is a rpg adventure real-time combat game combined with strategy!

You will act as the boss of an independent game studio to maintain the business

Research and develop "Yidao 999" to burn pigs in stone tombs, research and develop "Yuanmo" to challenge Slim, and "Orcs contend for hegemony" tribes and alliances!

"Pig Three Stones", "Rice Kouyou", three swordsmen and "Goosla" will all appear in the game

Be careful of that programmer, he may kill you at the critical moment!



Chessboard exploration:

Use your walking strategy reasonably, avoid numerous traps, and explore the world in the fog

Up Main union:

In the game, a large number of up players are made into npcs (authorized). You will meet them in the adventure and invite them to join the team to develop the game with you

Hair style system:

Your hair will become less every time you die, and you will become bald and strong! But when the light is 0, you will "die forever“

Meat pigeon

The way you acquire skills and talents is random, and there will be randomly generated checkpoints in the later stage!

name: 程序员必须死 Programmers must die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Programmers Must Die is adapted according to real events. Death will affect your hair volume. In the end, you will become bald and stronger. But when the hair volume is 0, you will "die forever"! You will play a small boss of an independent game studio
